__inputs.name: INSTANCE
__inputs.label: instance
__inputs.description: Domain and port of the monitored Akkoma instance in the format domain:port

__inputs.name: SCRAPE_JOB
__inputs.label: scrape_job
__inputs.description: Name of the scrape job as configured in victoriametrics’ or prometheus’ config

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(up{instance="${INSTANCE}", job="${SCRAPE_JOB}"}[5m])
# or if you want to count downtime of the Prometheus scraper as Akkoma downtime too,
# e.g. because both services are on the same host, you can use the following with VictoriaMetrics:
   #avg_over_time((up{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"} default 0.0)[5m])
# or this more complex query for plain Prometheus:
#   avg_over_time(sum(up{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"} or 0.0)[5m])

up{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}
# or if you want to count downtime of the Prometheus scraper as Akkoma downtime too,
# e.g. because both services are on the same host, you can use:
#   sum(up{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"} or 0.0)
# When using VictoriaMetrics-specific this simplifies to:
# up{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"} default 0.0

panels.title: Total DB Query Times per Second
Inbound HTTP Proc. Time per Second
Total Job Proc. Time per Second
BEAM VM Memory Usage Over Time

panels.description: Includes network traffic, but also communication to local non-elixir components like fast_html workers
panels.title: VM Port IO Traffic

panels.description: For improved insight this is tracks  federation-related jobs, i.e. RFP (Receive, Fetch, Publish) jobs, separately from everything else
panels.title: Jobs Per Minute - 24h Average

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(rate(pleroma_repo_query_query_time_fdist_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}[$__rate_interval])[48h]) * 60
# By default downtime is excluded from average; use below if it should count as zeroes instead (only on VictoriaMetrics)
# avg_over_time(rate(pleroma_repo_query_query_time_fdist_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}[$__rate_interval] default 0)[48h]) * 60

avg_over_time(rate(pleroma_repo_query_total_time_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}[$__rate_interval])[48h]) * 60
# By default downtime is excluded from average; use below if it should count as zeroes instead (only on VictoriaMetrics):
# avg_over_time(rate(pleroma_repo_query_total_time_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}[$__rate_interval] default 0)[48h]) * 60

avg_over_time((rate((sum(oban_job_completion_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}))[$__rate_interval]))[48h]) * 60
+ avg_over_time((rate((sum(oban_job_exception_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}))[$__rate_interval]))[48h]) * 60
# By default downtime is excluded from average; use below if it should count as zeroes instead (both VictoriaMetrics and Prometheus)
#avg_over_time((rate((sum(oban_job_completion_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}))[$__rate_interval]) or 0)[48h]) * 60
#+ avg_over_time((rate((sum(oban_job_exception_sum{job="${SCRAPE_JOB}", instance="${INSTANCE}"}))[$__rate_interval]) or 0)[48h]) * 60

panels.title: DB and Job Time Per Min - 48h Avg
HTTP Proc Time per Minute - 24h Avg
